channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: It's 'do or die' for electric vehicle maker Rivian as it breaks ground on a $5 billion plant

item.title: WATCH: At least 1 killed in Russian aerial attack on Ukraine
item.description: Ukraine released footage showing buildings and vehicles burning after what they said was an attack by Russia.

item.title: Target to expand next-day delivery to 35 more cities by end of October
item.description: The Minneapolis-based company says it will offer next-day delivery in 35 U.S. metro areas by the end of October.

item.title: Robert Redford, film icon, Oscar-winning director and activist, dead at 89
item.description: Robert Redford, film icon, Oscar-winning director and activist, has died at age 89.

item.title: Watch Live: FBI's Patel testifies at hearing in aftermath of Kirk assassination
item.description: FBI Director Kash Patel is appearing before the Senate Judiciary Committee on Tuesday for an annual hearing on oversight of the FBI.

item.title: Remembering Robert Redford: Photos show Hollywood star in iconic films
item.description: Pictures show Robert Redford in classic films including "Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid" and "Three Days of the Condor."

item.title: Kash Patel faces questions on Charlie Kirk investigation in congressional hearings
item.description: FBI Director Kash Patel to begin two days of questioning on Tuesday from congressional committees about his tenure leading the FBI.

item.title: Luigi Mangione's state terrorism charges dismissed, judge rules
item.description: Luigi Mangione appeared in court Tuesday in New York City, where his two state terrorism charges were thrown out.

item.title: Suspect in Charlie Kirk shooting likely to face charges Tuesday before first court hearing
item.description: Prosecutors are looking at filing a capital murder charge against the Utah man jailed in the killing of conservative activist Charlie Kirk.

item.title: Trump administration joins Republicans’ campaign to police speech in reaction to Kirk’s killing
